logs.title: Learn basic html, css, javascript to create blog
logs.description: Learn the basic of html, css, javascript to create blog, then start learning web design, create template and others.

logs.title: Fresh graduated as a computer & networking engineer
logs.description: After 3 years of hard work, learning and practicing, I finally graduated from vocational high school of Negeri Balimandara. I was so proud of myself.

logs.title: Become junior software engineer @dimata
logs.description: After graduated, joining the awesome team to create and maintain software for business and goverment at Dimata. Responsible to maintain the sites, codebase, create new apps, redesign apps.

logs.title: Promoted as a senior software engineer
logs.description: After 2 years of hard work, time to promoted as a senior software engineer. Responsible to redesign the apps, create microservices, integrate api, collab with designers, and create a design system for the company.

logs.title: Start freelance as a fullstack developer
logs.description: It's my turn time to start all of my career as freelancer. I resign to @dimata and start the journey.

logs.title: Create web design business @weebo
logs.description: With all of the experience and knowledge, I create a web design business @weebo. I'm so excited to start this new journey.
